fehd.ADR_TC: 香港中環伊利近街28號萬城閣1樓1號舖

geocode_en.formatted_address: Hong Kong, 中環伊利近街28號1/F

result.adr_address: Hong Kong, 中環伊利近街28號1/F
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, 中環伊利近街28號1/F
result.name: POP vegan

reviews.text: The food is awesome! Absolutely Awesome. They have many adapted dishes that tastes absolutely great. All ingredients are absolutely fresh and I would go again there. The price is high but on price/worth rating it is absolutely worth.

This is the first time I come to this restaurant, I really want to try something special that you can rarely taste outside.
Turn out POP Vegan doesn't disappoint me! 

We have 2 persons here and we order totally three dishes.

- Cauliflower Cake
Texture is quite special, it is crunchy on the  outside but moist on the inside. Different from the ordinary hash browns, it has certain texture because of the cauliflower and almond crunches. Nice! Most importantly... It's much bigger than my expectation, a fist-sized one! BTW, the mango salad is so refreshing! 

- Peking Duck Pizza
It reminds me the Peking Duck wrap I tasted in the old time when I was not a vegetarian~ The pizza is thin and crunchy, and the portion is so big! 

- Fish and chips
My most long-necking dish among all! Because I have never tasted vegan fish and chips before! Hard to discribe but the 'fish' (made from banana Blossoms) has the texture between fish and chicken. A little remark is that the coating is a bit too thick and too much. I would say... This is a dish that a vegan has to try once in a lifetime, but once is enough, lol! 

P. S. The dishes portions are quite large. In my case, we are so full up to the throat after meal, so I would suggest ordering two dishes is just enough to two people.
Nice choice for vegetarian! Nice food but it takes little bit long to wait for the food we ordered.

the food was great!! especially the tuna tartar. the mango, avocado and sauce made the tartar so refreshing and zesty. the tuna actually tasted like tuna as well. pizza was alright, not the best but acceptable. The crab burgers fillings were quite redundant as the crab cake is filled with the coleslaw which is also on top of the crab cake. other from that though, the flavor and texture of the burger was great. staff were really nice as well!! They also have a small grocery section where they sell some vegan cheeses and snacks so be sure to check it out. the food was on the pricier though but it was expected since it is located in central.

This is a well established and quality vegan restaurant. It was a great find among the many restaurants in central. Located on the second floor through a quiet corridor, the interior of the restaurant is very pleasant, cool and relaxing. The options and variety of the menu was excellent! While ordering, the staff were very friendly and accommodating to my peanut allergy :) We ordered the poutine, mushroom truffle pasta, and chicken with rice. The cheese here is made of coconut oil and the chicken was from wheat gluten but it was not seitan. They only use oat milk for milk substitutes. Overall the food was fresh and tasty!

result.name: POP vegan

reviews.text: The food is awesome! Absolutely Awesome. They have many adapted dishes that tastes absolutely great. All ingredients are absolutely fresh and I would go again there. The price is high but on price/worth rating it is absolutely worth.

我最喜歡的是意大利飯，食了第一口，眼睛不奇然地睜到最大看著朋友，說不出話來了。不愛食意大利飯的朋友認為我太誇張，所以嚐了一小口，然後反應和我一樣，還不斷點頭😂
my favorite one goes to the RISOTTO. When I have the first bite, I opened my eyes at the largest size and look at my friend. I didn't speak because I just want to enjoy it. My friend who doesn't like risotto thinks that I am too exaggerated, so he tasted a small bite and then reacted just like me, and nodded his head constantly. 😂

vegan
visit date: 2018-10
素食餐廳，在很隱密的二樓，但生意卻很好。食物很特別，用一些素食食材去做出吃肉的口感及感覺。價格偏高。

This is the first time I come to this restaurant, I really want to try something special that you can rarely taste outside.
Turn out POP Vegan doesn't disappoint me! 

We have 2 persons here and we order totally three dishes.

- Cauliflower Cake
Texture is quite special, it is crunchy on the  outside but moist on the inside. Different from the ordinary hash browns, it has certain texture because of the cauliflower and almond crunches. Nice! Most importantly... It's much bigger than my expectation, a fist-sized one! BTW, the mango salad is so refreshing! 

- Peking Duck Pizza
It reminds me the Peking Duck wrap I tasted in the old time when I was not a vegetarian~ The pizza is thin and crunchy, and the portion is so big! 

- Fish and chips
My most long-necking dish among all! Because I have never tasted vegan fish and chips before! Hard to discribe but the 'fish' (made from banana Blossoms) has the texture between fish and chicken. A little remark is that the coating is a bit too thick and too much. I would say... This is a dish that a vegan has to try once in a lifetime, but once is enough, lol! 

P. S. The dishes portions are quite large. In my case, we are so full up to the throat after meal, so I would suggest ordering two dishes is just enough to two people.
Nice choice for vegetarian! Nice food but it takes little bit long to wait for the food we ordered.
